sentences: Panna Hanska. Graatsilised pannad tantsisid poloneesi.
Ma olen pannud oma kinga kaunistuseks lilledega.
Tema pani rõivad ära ja läks magama.
context: The word 'panna' is the da-infinitive form of Estonian verb 'panema'. It means to put, place, or set something somewhere. In the example sentence, it's used as a proper name (Panna Hanska), but generally it refers to the action of putting or placing objects.
